attributes.action: FIGHT FOR ZIMBABWE, AND ASSURE YOURSELF A PLACE IN HISTORY, AS THE ONLY ONE IN A POSITION TO DO SOMETHING THAT CARED ENOUGH TO DO SOMETHING TANGIBLE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr. Brown, please fight for democracy in Zimbabwe, by backing Morgan Tsvangiri against the despot Mugabe.Well done for your stand at the United Nations.Please continue to press internationally for intervention, and influence Thabo Mbeki.You can both assure your place in history if you rescue the Zimbabwean People from their dreadful plight.My sister still lives there, hoping and praying for change at last.Please don't let the people of Zimbabwe down.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
